tagline: Open 'til 3 AM. We've seen things too.
style: 80s synth pop jingle, cheesy and fun
lyrics:
Pizza Palace, we're open late!
Hot and fresh, it tastes so great!
Three AM and still goin' strong,
Come on in, you can't go wrong!
Pizza Palace - we've seen things too!
But our pizza? Always fresh for you!
suno_prompt: 80s synth pop radio jingle, catchy and cheesy, male and female vocals, retro keyboards, fun local pizza commercial vibe, 18 seconds
notes: Late-night pizza joint that hints at seeing strange customers
